question_text: Rate how much you agree with these statements about yourself:

statements.text: I enjoy working with tools and building things
I like expressing myself through art, music, or writing
I'm curious about how things work and enjoy learning new facts
I feel good when I help others with their problems
I like being the leader in group activities

question_text: How well do these statements describe you?

statements.text: I prefer hands-on activities over reading
I often come up with creative ideas
I'm good at understanding how others feel
I like organizing and planning things
